snippet.title: How Adding NPCs Improved my Game's Immersion | Devlog 3
snippet.description:
Hey guys, welcome to the third devlog on my pixel art survival sandbox. Today I'll be showcasing some of the systems I've been working on over the past month and a bit: NPC spawning, daily routines, notifications, and most importantly - dialogue. I'll give a simplified explanation of how each system works, as well as discussing any difficulties I encountered while programming them. Hopefully you learn something new, or at least enjoy the video! 👍


💬 Join my discord server here!
https://discord.gg/NxDSW65sUY
